title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8000.7 - Supervision categories
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8000.7 - Supervision categories

State Regulations

There shall be three general categories of supervision of
releasees under the division's supervision: intensive supervision, regular
supervision, and inactive supervision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8000.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
